title: Fundamentals of Chess: Advanced Middlegame
headline: This free online course is an advanced description of games depicting the fundamental tactics of the Chess middlegame.
description: This course on advanced Chess strategies will help you explore different game scenarios from a mathematical perspective. It provides you with an understanding of Chess tactics by analysing game examples and solving the product of complex tactics. The course explores the main areas you must address and identifies the errors to avoid. We answer questions you might have like ‘what is the best way to develop your pieces?' or 'why check early?'.
courseDescription:
This course on the ‘Fundamentals of Chess: Advanced Middlegame’ demonstrates the working principles of using progressive techniques and advanced game strategies in Chess. It is the follow-up to the course ‘Fundamentals of Chess: Middlegame’. First, it defines the elements and processes of common actions, such as developing or attacking unprotected pieces. Next, it will help you study and create your own tactics, provide complicated advanced techniques, attacks and moves and explains how to protect your pieces so you have a strong game. It then discusses complex examples and useful tactics, answering questions such as ‘what is the fastest legal way to castle?’ or ‘can you win only using pawns?’.

Following this, the course prepares you to analyse games where you can see these techniques in action. You will be able to learn how to create compositions of pieces correctly and how to convert them to your advantage. You will learn how to evaluate your opponent's games and moves. Next, the course explains how to ‘castle’ early and successfully. You will be able to start a game confidently and attack the unprotected pieces. 

This course will provide you with the skills required to use and understand advanced Chess strategies if you are a beginner. It provides accurate and precise methods you can use in your movements. In addition, it touches on the fundamentals of advanced Chess tactics in the middlegame. This course is ideal for those more familiar with Chess or those who want to understand how to use advanced strategic methods. Register for this course and become adept at using these strategies in the game of Chess.
